name: VividWalls Content Marketing Agent - MCP Enhanced
description: Content Marketing Agent with WordPress MCP integration for Art of Space blog automation and SEO-optimized content creation

parameters.responseBody:
{
  "status": "success",
  "agent": "Content Marketing",
  "timestamp": "{{ $now }}",
  "task_id": "{{ $('Content Marketing Agent').first().json.task_id || 'direct_request' }}",
  "content_results": "{{ $('Content Marketing Agent').first().json.output }}",
  "tools_used": "{{ $('Content Marketing Agent').first().json.intermediateSteps }}",
  "session_id": "vividwalls_content_marketing",
  "content_metrics": {
    "posts_created": "{{ $('Content Marketing Agent').first().json.intermediateSteps | selectattr('action', 'search', 'create_post') | list | length }}",
    "seo_optimizations": "{{ $('Content Marketing Agent').first().json.intermediateSteps | selectattr('action', 'search', 'optimize_seo') | list | length }}",
    "art_spotlights": "{{ $('Content Marketing Agent').first().json.intermediateSteps | selectattr('action', 'search', 'art_spotlight') | list | length }}",
    "collection_announcements": "{{ $('Content Marketing Agent').first().json.intermediateSteps | selectattr('action', 'search', 'collection_announcement') | list | length }}",
    "content_type": "{{ $('Content Marketing Agent').first().json.content_type || 'blog_post' }}",
    "target_keywords": "{{ $('Content Marketing Agent').first().json.target_keywords || [] }}",
    "estimated_seo_impact": "{{ $('Content Marketing Agent').first().json.seo_score || 'calculating' }}"
  },
  "escalation_status": "{{ $('Escalate to Business Manager').first().json ? 'escalated' : 'completed' }}"
}
